page.title: 03HOME LIFE - TILMANSTONE
page.content: Life-styles vary from{relatively {poor,}to{private income}families. 75% of younger women{work.}Mostly part-time in the village and nearby towns. Farms employ{crop pickers}in the season for fruit and vegetables. Most families own a{car,}few have {computers}or{videos. Freezers}are more common. 80% of households have a{pet, normally cats or dogs. {Mortgages, HP loans}and{credit cards are part of everyday life for many. {School fees}and{private medicine}are paid for by a small number. Residents attend Eastry or Sandwich for{doctors and{dentists. Family get-togethers are part of village life.{Sunday dinner}for most is traditional 'roast' meal. Church {festivals}are well-attended at St. Andrews. Normal attendance is dwind- ling as in many other churches.
